snippet: Top party and military officials gathered at an indoor stadium in Pyongyang on Tuesday where they made speeches vowing to uphold Kim Jong-un as their unchallenged top leader
abstract: Top North Korean party and military officials make speeches in support of Kim Jong-un at event to commemorate second anniversary of death of his father, Kim Jong-il; analysts say event was staged in part to show that Kim is in control after execution of his uncle, Jang Song-thaek.
lead_paragraph: Top party and military officials gathered at an indoor stadium in Pyongyang on Tuesday where they made speeches vowing to uphold Kim Jong-un as their unchallenged top leader

headline.main: North Korea: A Pageant of Power
headline.print_headline: North Korea: A Pageant of Power
